area_code = 591 | blank_name = | blank_info = | blank1_name = | blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = }} Ozumba (or Ozumba de Alzate) is a town in the state of México in Mexico. About 3,000 people live there. ==References== Category:Towns in Mexico Category:Settlements in Mexico (state) Category:Municipality seats in Mexico (state)
